document_data.mainbody:
orock was an orc warrior during the late 15th century DR.
In 1484 DR, during the orc and drow assault on the Silver Marches, Korock was guiding a contingent of troops. Regis used the name of this orc in order to deceive the shamans Kllug and Innanig, who were marching toward Nesm√©. He said that Korock had angered their drow allies.
